requiredOn.expr: (identity['applicantOriginPlace'] != null && (identity['applicantOriginPlace'].get(0).value.equalsIgnoreCase('In Uganda') ) && identity['foundLink'] !='Y' && identity['userServiceType'] != null && (identity['userServiceType'].get(0).value.equalsIgnoreCase('By Birth /Descent') || identity['userServiceType'].get(0).value.equalsIgnoreCase('By Naturalisation') ))
